description: This file contains test cases for the Nvidia model integration within the agno project, utilizing pytest for testing various functionalities such as basic responses, streaming, asynchronous calls, memory handling, and response modeling.

classes.name: MovieScript
classes.description: A Pydantic model used for testing structured response outputs, representing a movie script with title, genre, and plot.

methods.name: _assert_metrics
methods.description: A helper function to assert that the metrics in the response contain positive token counts and that total tokens equal the sum of input and output tokens.

methods.name: test_basic
methods.description: Tests the basic functionality of the Nvidia agent, verifying response content, message roles, and metrics.

methods.name: test_basic_stream
methods.description: Tests streaming responses from the Nvidia agent, ensuring the response stream is iterable and responses contain content.

methods.name: test_async_basic
methods.description: Asynchronous test for basic Nvidia agent response, verifying content and message roles.

methods.name: test_async_basic_stream
methods.description: Asynchronous test for streaming responses, verifying content in each streamed response.

methods.name: test_with_memory
methods.description: Tests the agent's memory feature, ensuring conversation history is maintained and reflected in responses.

methods.name: test_response_model
methods.description: Tests structured response output using a Pydantic model, verifying that the response content matches the model.

methods.name: test_json_response_mode
methods.description: Tests structured response output in JSON mode, verifying that the response content matches the model.

methods.name: test_history
methods.description: Tests the agent's session history feature with SQLite storage, verifying message count and sequence.
